remarks: Define the class of all complete lattices, where every subset of the base set has an LUB and a GLB. (Contributed by NM, 18-Oct-2012.) (Revised by NM, 12-Sep-2018.)
statement: df-clat $p |- CLat = { p e. Poset | ( dom ( lub ` p ) = ~P ( Base ` p ) /\ dom ( glb ` p ) = ~P ( Base ` p ) ) } $.
